title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3745/89 of 13 December 1989 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2220/85 laying down common detailed rules for the application of the system of securities for agricultural products
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3745/89
of 13 December 1989
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2220/85 laying down common detailed rules for the application of the system of securities for agricultural products
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Regulation (EEC) No 2220/85, the following point (g) is added to Article 1:
'(g) Regulation (EEC) No 1491/85 (soya beans) (*).
(*) OJ No L 151, 10. 6. 1985, p. 15.'

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 December 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 151, 10. 6. 1985, p. 15.
(2) OJ No L 197, 26. 7. 1988, p. 11.
(3) OJ No L 205, 3. 8. 1985, p. 5.
(4) OJ No L 113, 30. 4. 1987, p. 31.
(5) OJ No L 204, 2. 8. 1985, p. 1.
(6) OJ No L 128, 11. 5. 1989, p. 24.
